column3: if we are headed into a cooker or a smudge. At 2:46 A.M. last night
column4: the lights went on upstairs. The bells went off
column6: but I can’t say that I ever really hear them. In ten seconds
column7: I was dressed and walking out the door of my room at the station.|My Sister’s Keeper|Jodi Picoult

column1: 02:46|2.46 am|2.46 am. The chain drive whirred and the paper target slid down the darkened range
column2: ducking in and out of shafts of yellow incandescent light. At the firing station
column3: a figure waited in the shadows. As the target passed the twenty-five-foot mark
column4: the man opened fire: eight shots-rapid

column1: 02:46|Two forty-six|Vicki shoved her glasses at her face and peered at the clock. Two forty-six. 'I don't have time for this' she muttered
column3: heart still slamming against her ribs.|Blood Lines|Tanya Huff
